note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
body:
This repository is my way of giving back to the community that created so many of the tools I use every day.  If I feel that I've written something that might be useful to others, I'll post it here.

### Licensing

All of this code is open source, and permissive if possible.  The FreeBSD license (2-clause) is my favorite and that's what you should find my original work licensed under.  If you find a different license for something I wrote, create a bug for it.

### Authors and Contributors

@ckxng is the sole author of the new stuff, though some other code is included from other open source projects.

### Support or Contact

Having trouble with any of this code?  Feel free to email contact@ecc12.com.
name: Pub
tagline: Public Source Code for Electronic Christian Consulting
